org.araneaframework.uilib.form.constraint
Class BaseCompositeConstraint

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.form.constraint.BaseConstraint
      org.araneaframework.uilib.form.constraint.BaseCompositeConstraint
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constraint, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AndConstraint, OrConstraint
public abstract class BaseCompositeConstraint
extends BaseConstraint

This class is a generalization of a constraint that may contain other constraints.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

constraints

protected List constraints
List of Constraints that this constraint should handle.

Constructor Detail

BaseCompositeConstraint

public BaseCompositeConstraint()
An empty constructor that expects other constraints to be added later. Use addConstraint(Constraint) or addConstraints(Collection) to add constraints.

BaseCompositeConstraint

public BaseCompositeConstraint(Constraint constraint)
A constructor that requires a constraint to be provided immediately, and other constraints later. Use addConstraint(Constraint) or addConstraints(Collection) to add more constraints.

Parameters:
constraint - a single constraint.
Since:
1.0.9

BaseCompositeConstraint

public BaseCompositeConstraint(Collection constraints)
A constructor that lets all constraints be added at once. Use addConstraint(Constraint) or addConstraints(Collection) to add more constraints.

Parameters:
constraints - a collection of Constraints.
Since:
1.0.9

Adds a contained constraint.

Parameters:

Returns:

Adds contained constraints from supplied Collection.

clearConstraints

public void clearConstraints()
Clears contained constraints.

setEnvironment

public void setEnvironment(Environment environment)
Description copied from interface: Constraint
Sets the Environment of this Constraint. Environment should come from whatever Component that this Constraint is operating on.

The Environment of a Constraint may be set to non-null value only once, further calls are ignored. Application programmer typically never calls this method as Environment is propagated seamlessly.

Specified by:
setEnvironment in interface Constraint
Overrides:
setEnvironment in class BaseConstraint
